channel.title: Endorphin physics engine
channel.description:
I recently found this when i was on youtube searching about gta iv, i noticed other people made animations to, tried it out. I just downloaded it yesterday, it pretty easy to use, here is a few i made:
http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=5032881811103481756&hl=en
You can download it here: http://www.naturalmotion.com/ele.htm
About an hour later(uploading, processing all the shit google does to get your ass to hurt)
The link might not work right now, and i thre the video together at liek 3 am. So im not gunna folo with it.. If it doent work tomorrow ill justt use utube.

item.title: Endorphin physics engine
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:9, topic:204699”][quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=270230.msg2223332#msg2223332 date=1210668997]
Now…

Do some skeletal work and get those into C4D and render out some human animations.
[/quote]
I would but i dont have $1,000[/quote]
Evidently you also do not have a brain.

Read full topic

item.title: Endorphin physics engine
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:4, topic:204699”]Confused me a bit. I also saw the videos on youtube when searching for GTA IV.
Keep working at it though, sometimes it seems a bit choppy and I didn’t understand what was going on. Were the dudes getting shot when their limbs were just randomly coming off?[/quote]
It was late, didnt feel like captions, he was getting sniped in the last 2.

Keep working at it though, sometimes it seems a bit choppy and I didn’t understand what was going on. Were the dudes getting shot when their limbs were just randomly coming off?[/quote]
